#coding:utf-8

from generic import Generic as g



[文档]class Shop(object):
    '''
    店铺接口
    '''
    ##########################店铺###################################

[文档]    def get_shop(self, conf):
        '''
        获取商家信息
        '''
        url = '/shop/get-ajax'
        return g.post_requests(conf, url)

    ###########################商品库##################################

[文档]    def product_list(self,conf, args):
        '''
        获取商品列表
        '''
        url = "/product/list-ajax"
        return g.post_requests(conf, url, args)

    

[文档]    def product_on_sale(self, conf, args):
        '''
                上架商品
        '''
        uri = '/product/on-sale-ajax'
        return g.post_requests(conf, uri, args)

    

[文档]    def product_off_sale(self, conf, args):
        '''
        下架商品
        '''
        uri = "/product/off-sale-ajax"
        return g.post_requests(conf, uri, args)

    

[文档]    def product_add(self,conf,args):
        '''
        添加商品
        '''
        url = "/product/add-ajax"
        return g.post_requests(conf, url, args)

    

[文档]    def product_check(self,conf,args):
        '''
        删除商品检查渠道商是否在使用
        '''
        url = "/product/check-product-ajax"
        return g.post_requests(conf, url, args)


[文档]    def product_del(self,conf, args):
        '''
        删除商品
        '''
        url = "/product/del-ajax"
        return g.post_requests(conf, url, args)

        '''
        添加商品分类
        '''
        url = '/product/category-add-ajax'
        return g.post_requests(conf, url, args)

    

[文档]    def category_del(self, conf, data):
        '''
        删除商品分类
        '''
        url = '/product/category-del-ajax'
        return g.post_requests(conf, url, id=data)

    
    ################################商品规格##############################

[文档]    def kind_list(self, conf):
        '''
        '''
        url = '/product/kind-list-ajax'
        return g.post_requests(conf, url, page=True)

    

[文档]    def kind_add(self, conf,args):
        '''
        添加商品规格
        '''
        url = '/product/kind-add-ajax'
        return  g.post_requests(conf, url, args)

        '''
        删除商品规格
        '''
        url = '/product/kind-del-ajax'
        return g.post_requests(conf, url, id=args)

[文档]    def shop_order_auto_settings(self, conf,data):
        '''
        更新订单自动任务设置信息(交易设置)
        '''
        url = '/shop/update-shop-order-auto-settings-ajax'
        return g.post_requests(conf, url, data)

    

[文档]    def shipping_order_type_status_update(self, conf, data):
        '''
        配送方式对（普通订单，秒杀，拼团，积分商城等类型订单单独适配）
        '''
        url = '/shop/shipping-order-type-status-update'
        return g.post_requests(conf, url, data)

    

[文档]    def shipping_status_update(self, conf, data):
        '''
        更新商品配送设置（自提&快递）
        '''
        url = '/shop/shipping-status-update'
        return g.post_requests(conf, url, data)

    

[文档]    def get_used_address_list(self,conf):
        '''
        获取常用地址列表
        '''
        url = '/shop/get-used-address-list-ajax'
        return g.post_requests(conf, url, page=True)

    

[文档]    def add_used_address(self, conf ,args):
        '''
        添加常用地址
        '''
        url = '/shop/add-used-address-ajax'
        return g.post_requests(conf, url, args)

    

[文档]    def update_used_address(self,conf, args):
        '''
        更新某条常用地址

        url = '/shop/update-used-address-ajax'
